value.description: A set of metric values in a time range.

data.description: Array of data points representing the metric values.

average.description: the average value in the time range.

count.description: the number of samples in the time range. Can be used to determine the number of values that contributed to the average value.

maximum.description: the greatest value in the time range.

minimum.description: the least value in the time range.

timeStamp.description: the timestamp for the metric value in ISO 8601 format.

total.description: the sum of all of the values in the time range.

id.description: the id, resourceId, of the metric.

type.description: the resource type of the metric resource.

unit.description: Number representing the unit of the metric. 0=Count, 1=Bytes, 2=Seconds, 3=CountPerSecond, 4=BytesPerSecond, 5=Percent, 6=MilliSeconds, 7=ByteSeconds

oldValue.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain.

retention.description: the retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain.  Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

timeGrain.description: the time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric. Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

value.description: The collection of metric value sets.

items.description: A set of metric values in a time range.

data.description: Array of data points representing the metric values.

average.description: the average value in the time range.

count.description: the number of samples in the time range. Can be used to determine the number of values that contributed to the average value.

maximum.description: the greatest value in the time range.

minimum.description: the least value in the time range.

timeStamp.description: the timestamp for the metric value in ISO 8601 format.

total.description: the sum of all of the values in the time range.

id.description: the id, resourceId, of the metric.

type.description: the resource type of the metric resource.

unit.description: Number representing the unit of the metric. 0=Count, 1=Bytes, 2=Seconds, 3=CountPerSecond, 4=BytesPerSecond, 5=Percent, 6=MilliSeconds, 7=ByteSeconds

oldValue.description: Metric definition class specifies the metadata for a metric.

id.description: the resource identifier of the metric definition.

metricAvailabilities.description: the collection of what aggregation intervals are available to be queried.

items.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain.

retention.description: the retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain.  Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

timeGrain.description: the time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric. Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

primaryAggregationType.description: the primary aggregation type value defining how to use the values for display.

resourceId.description: the resource identifier of the resource that emitted the metric.

value.description: the values for the metric definitions.

args.value: [OAUTH LOGIN SERVER] Flask OAuth2 login server running.
